ygData.subject: Re: Tunare Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi!! Yes, I m still around although more of a troller on this list than anything else anymore.  Plus, i m a really bad cutter and snipper so it takes me awhile
ygData.messageBody:
Hi!! Yes, I'm still around although more of a troller
on this list than anything else anymore. Plus, i'm a
really bad cutter and snipper so it takes me awhile to
post LOL. Anyway, I'm still reading (or at least
skimming) the list. Not sure about others from Tunare
who are still around skimming and trolling.

Thex Luteslinger
51st level bard
Black Tower
Tunare

> Date: Fri, 13 Oct 2000 10:26:49 -0400
> From: JESSICA_WEBBER@...
> Subject: Tunare Bards
>
>
> How about Tunare then?
>
> I can't possibly be the only Tunare bard on this
> list. Is Thex still
> around? I think he was Tunare.
>
> Peace
> Evulia <Sisterhood>
>
